blogPost.title: How can space technology support life on Earth? Answer by @awaisahmedna, Founder and CEO @PixxelSpace.  https://t.co/8mQtU6NbDV https://t.co/apokfiEzGZ
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 地球上の生命を支える宇宙技術とは？Answer by @awaisahmedna, Founder and CEO @PixxelSpace. https://t.co/8mQtU6NbDV https://t.co/apokfiEzGZ
空间技术如何能支持地球上的生命？回答者：@awaisahmedna, 创始人兼CEO @PixxelSpace. https://t.co/8mQtU6NbDV https://t.co/apokfiEzGZ
空間技術如何能支持地球上的生命？回答者：@awaisahmedna, 創始人兼CEO @PixxelSpace. https://t.co/8mQtU6NbDV https://t.co/apokfiEzGZ

previous.title: What negative effects does technology have on the brain? Answer by Ronna Glickman, Speaker, Educator, Consultant https://t.co/e1E5PLVg7I. https://t.co/LZsJl8Vs3I https://t.co/mq7kGkeCmf

localize.full_text: テクノロジーが脳に与える悪影響とは？Answer by Ronna Glickman, Speaker, Educator, Consultant https://t.co/e1E5PLVg7I. https://t.co/LZsJl8Vs3I https://t.co/mq7kGkeCmf
技术对大脑有什么负面的影响？回答者：Ronna Glickman，演讲者、教育家、顾问 https://t.co/e1E5PLVg7I。 https://t.co/LZsJl8Vs3I https://t.co/mq7kGkeCmf
技術對大腦有什麼負面的影響？回答者：Ronna Glickman，演講者、教育家、顧問 https://t.co/e1E5PLVg7I。 https://t.co/LZsJl8Vs3I https://t.co/mq7kGkeCmf

next.title: How does a company align behind a cause? Answer by @karagoldin, Founder & CEO, @hint. https://t.co/KtCBii8DwS https://t.co/2v8vJi5mS9

localize.full_text: 企業はどのようにして目的を達成するのでしょうか？Answer by @karagoldin, Founder & CEO, @hint. https://t.co/KtCBii8DwS https://t.co/2v8vJi5mS9
一家公司如何在一项事业背后保持一致？回答者：@karagoldin, 创始人& CEO, @hint. https://t.co/KtCBii8DwS https://t.co/2v8vJi5mS9
一家公司如何在一項事業背後保持一致？回答者：@karagoldin, 創始人& CEO, @hint. https://t.co/KtCBii8DwS https://t.co/2v8vJi5mS9
